channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller 8
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller 8

item.title: CVE-2022-24423|2024-09-16T19:46:48.789Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%208
item.description: Dell iDRAC8 versions prior to 2.83.83.83 contain a denial of service vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to cause resource exhaustion in the webserver, resulting in a denial of service condition.
